title: Frank Niehaus
text: Francis W. "Fanny" Niehaus (March 16, 1902 - March 1985) was a professional <a href="American%20football">football</a> player from <a href="Seymour%2C%20Indiana">Seymour, Indiana</a>. After attending high school in <a href="Akron%2C%20Ohio">Akron, Ohio</a>, Niehaus attended <a href="Washington%20%26amp%3B%20Jefferson%20College">Washington & Jefferson College</a>. After college, he made his professional debut in the early <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a> with the <a href="Akron%20Pros">Akron Pros</a> in 1925. He later played for the <a href="Pottsville%20Maroons">Pottsville Maroons</a> in 1926 before ending his professional football career.
